title: Installation
content:
Run 
wsl --list --online
to see list of distros
If the installation is not successfull, please contact me to rgarcia117@miners.utep.edu
Once installed, create a username (It can be your windows username)
IMPORTANT:Create a password. If your password is invisible, don't worry, it is still being typed, just press enter at the end
Once done, it should look like this:

title: Accessing WSL
content: Open the start menu and type `ubuntu` or `wsl`
Once opened, you should see a terminal window
Another way is to open PowerShell and type `wsl` or `ubuntu`.
